goal_text: Achieve 30 million dollars in annual revenue by expanding existing markets and entering Malaysia and Thailand
Improve customer experience by reducing cart abandonment to 45 percent and increasing satisfaction score to 9 out of 10
Increase mobile conversion rate from 1.8 percent to 3.5 percent through mobile app launch and UX optimization
Reduce customer acquisition cost by 30 percent while maintaining a minimum 15 percent EBITDA margin
Implement predictive inventory and supply chain optimization to reduce stockouts by 60 percent
Establish a data-driven culture where 90 percent of strategic decisions are backed by analytics insights
Achieve carbon-neutral delivery and 80 percent sustainable product sourcing
Expand product portfolio by launching Home and Beauty categories contributing 3 million dollars in revenue
